articles.author: Sean Endicott
articles.title: New Surface Pro details emerge as Microsoft prepares to downgrade Windows 10 and OpenAI is accused of cheating on AI benchmarks - Windows Central
articles.description: Report of a new Surface Pro and a mysterious Amazon listing for an Xbox controller made for an exciting week in tech.
articles.content: Microsoft had a series of nightmares last week. This week, the tech giant got some rest, as much of the news surrounding Microsoft was positive. Reports of two new Surface devices plus the rollout of… [+5922 chars]
